full_description:
The Job:

Location: Remote |California | Hawaii | Illinois | New York | Colorado | Massachusetts | Washington

We are looking for a Software Engineer - Frontend to join a team building the next generation of a growing education technology platform. We are looking for Frontend Engineers to join us in designing, building, and improving the performance and reliability of our products as we learn and grow. You will play a key role in improving code quality, user experience and team velocity resulting in delightful experiences for our customers.

What you will do:

Develop for one or more of our products and collaborate to launch new products, iterate on existing features, and build a world-class user experience
Partner with the Product Design team to transform mock-ups into engaging, accessible web experiences
Write code in HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript using Angular framework
Write appropriate tests using automated test driven techniques for ensure code quality
Participate and conduct code reviews for team members

What you bring to the role:

Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science (or Equivalent Experience) with a strong grasp of CS fundamentals
Experience in writing testing scripts in JavaScript
2+ years building web applications using several frameworks
Experience with unit testing frameworks
Ability to translate designs into mobile friendly styles using preprocessors such as SASS
Eager to solve challenging problems regarding algorithms, data structures, and web application performance
2+ years working with JavaScript/TypeScript and one or more modern frameworks (Angular 2+ preferred)
Familiar with State Management using such as NgRx, Redux, RxJs
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
A strong self-starter, operationally focused; a problem-solver
Excellent interpersonal, written, and oral communication skills
Strong understanding of backend services and Agile frameworks, is a plus

What We Offer

Competitive compensation plan
Innovative, high growth and collaborative culture.
Generous PTO package with floating holidays
Fun team events (Monthly and virtual for now)
Great Benefits including: Medical, dental, vision, life 401k and more!

SketchyGroup LLC is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
